abstract: Brazilian minister Romero Juca, who was newly appointed to post by interim president Michel Temer, announces that he will step down after recordings surface that indicate he was trying to impede corruption inquiry into Petrobras by drawing attention to impeachment of Pres Dilma Rousseff.
lead_paragraph: A government minister appointed by Brazil’s new interim president said he would resign after excerpts of a conversation indicated he was trying to impede a corruption inquiry.

headline.main: Transcript Suggests a Plot Behind Effort to Oust Brazilian President
headline.print_headline: Transcript Suggests Plot Led to Ouster in Brazil

snippet: A government minister appointed by Brazil’s new interim president said he would resign after excerpts of a conversation indicated he was trying to impede a corruption inquiry.
